name: NovelUpdates
0:
”Alexa, open novel updates”
”Alexa, ask novel updates to check novel status”
”Alexa, ask novel updates to check novel status for Clockwork Planet”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: novel updates
des:
Check latest updates of your favorite light and web novels on novelupdates.com. Ask when was the last chapter translated to see if you have something exciting to read today!
You don't need the exact title of the novel, part of the title is usually enough to find best match.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
